trans-unit.source: Definition of the WS-Trust service contract implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ws-trust 服务协定实现的定义。

trans-unit.source: Implements the following service contract interfaces: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustFeb2005SyncContract> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13SyncContract> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustFeb2005AsyncContract> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13AsyncContract>
trans-unit.target: 实现以下服务协定接口:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustFeb2005SyncContract>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13SyncContract>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustFeb2005AsyncContract>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13AsyncContract></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13AsyncContract> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustFeb2005AsyncContract> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13SyncContract> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustFeb2005SyncContract>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The configuration object that initializes this instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化此实例配置对象。

trans-unit.source: Configures any binding elements to support the contract behavior.
trans-unit.target: 配置所有绑定元素以支持协定行为。

trans-unit.source: The contract description to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的协定说明。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to modify.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的终结点。

trans-unit.source: The objects that binding elements require to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素以支持该行为所需的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contract description for which the extension is intended.
trans-unit.target: 扩展所针对的协定说明。

trans-unit.source: The contract description for which the extension is intended.
trans-unit.target: 扩展所针对的协定说明。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 终结点。

trans-unit.source: The client runtime.
trans-unit.target: 客户端运行时。

trans-unit.source: Implements a modification or extension of the client across a contract.
trans-unit.target: 在协定范围内实现的修改或扩展客户端。

trans-unit.source: The contract description to be modified.
trans-unit.target: 要修改的协定说明。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: 公开协定的终结点。

trans-unit.source: The dispatch runtime that controls service execution.
trans-unit.target: 控制服务执行调度运行时。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.DispatchRequest*>.
trans-unit.target: 开始对<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.DispatchRequest*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.DispatchRequest*>的异步调用

trans-unit.source: Defines the request parameters to process and exposes properties that determine the response message and action.
trans-unit.target: 定义要处理的请求参数，并揭示确定响应消息和操作的属性。

trans-unit.source: An optional asynchronous callback, to be called when the dispatch is complete.
trans-unit.target: 可选的异步回调，以调度完成时调用。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous dispatch request from other requests.
trans-unit.target: 一个用户提供的对象，它将此特定异步调度请求与其他请求区别开来。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IAsyncResult>表示异步操作。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Used as the input to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.EndDispatchRequest*> method.
trans-unit.target: 用于输入到<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.EndDispatchRequest*>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.EndDispatchRequest*>

trans-unit.source: Handles an asynchronous call to the STS.
trans-unit.target: 处理对 STS 的异步调用。

trans-unit.source: The incoming request message.
trans-unit.target: 传入的请求消息。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust request Serializer.
trans-unit.target: Ws-trust 请求序列化程序中。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust response Serializer.
trans-unit.target: Ws-trust 响应序列化程序中。

trans-unit.source: The request SOAP action.
trans-unit.target: 请求 SOAP 操作。

trans-unit.source: The response SOAP action.
trans-unit.target: 响应 SOAP 操作。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the WS-Trust version of the incoming request.
trans-unit.target: 命名空间 URI 的传入请求的 Ws-trust 版本。

trans-unit.source: A callback that gets invoked when the asynchronous call ends.
trans-unit.target: 异步调用结束时获得调用的回调。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains state information for the asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含此异步调用的状态信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: IAsyncResult that should be passed back to the End method to complete the Asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: 应传递回 End 方法以完成异步调用的 IAsyncResult。

trans-unit.source: One of the argument is null.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个参数为 null。

trans-unit.target: Namespace 的传入请求的 Ws-trust 版本的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> object using the local resolver information of the WSTrustServiceClient.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for a contract.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，将自定义 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 元素写入到为协定生成的 WSDL 中。

trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 提供的实现<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现没有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in a derived class to implement specific behavior.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法在派生类来实现特定的行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> that exports the contract information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"> </xref>导出协定信息。

trans-unit.source: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the contract description.
trans-unit.target: 提供从导出的 WSDL 元素到协定说明的映射。

trans-unit.source: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 将自定义 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 元素写入到生成的 WSDL 的终结点。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation does the following for every WS-Trust contract found: 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现为执行以下每个找到的 WS 信任协定︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: Includes the appropriate WS-Trust namespace in the WSDL.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 中包括适当的 Ws-trust 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Imports the appropriate WS-Trust schema and all dependent schemas.
trans-unit.target: 导入相应的 WS 信任架构和所有相关架构。

trans-unit.source: Fixes the Messages of each operation to appropriate WS-Trust equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 修复了为相应的 WS 信任等效项的每个操作的消息。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust Contract exposed by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) takes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> in and returns a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> out.
trans-unit.target: 公开 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 的 WS 信任协定采用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>中并返回<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>out。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: But WS-Trust messages expect an RST and return an RSTR/RSTRC.
trans-unit.target: 但 Ws-trust 消息预期 RST 和 RSTR/RSTRC 返回。

trans-unit.source: This method fixes the message names with the appropriate WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: 此方法修复适当的 Ws-trust 消息的消息名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> that exports the contract information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"> </xref>导出协定信息。

trans-unit.source: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the endpoint description.
trans-unit.target: 提供从导出的 WSDL 元素到终结点说明的映射。

trans-unit.source: During WSDL generation, this method fixes a specified operation message element to refer to the RST and RSTR elements of the appropriate WS-Trust version.
trans-unit.target: 在 WSDL 生成期间此方法解决了指定的操作消息元素来引用适当的 Ws-trust 版本的 RST 和 RSTR 元素。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust Contract exposed by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) takes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> in and returns a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> out.
trans-unit.target: 公开 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 的 WS 信任协定采用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>中并返回<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>out。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: But WS-Trust messages expect an RST and return an RSTR/RSTRC.
trans-unit.target: 但 Ws-trust 消息预期 RST 和 RSTR/RSTRC 返回。

trans-unit.source: This method fixes the message names with the appropriate WS-Trust messages specified by the XML qualified names in `inputMessageElement` and `outputMessageLement`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用适当的 Ws-trust 消息中的 XML 限定名称由指定修复消息名称`inputMessageElement`和`outputMessageLement`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> that has the current state of the exported WSDL.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"> </xref>具有导出 WSDL 的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The WSDL PortType for which the messages are to be fixed.
trans-unit.target: 要修复消息 WSDL PortType。

trans-unit.source: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the endpoint description.
trans-unit.target: 提供从导出的 WSDL 元素到终结点说明的映射。

trans-unit.source: The operation name inside the PortType.
trans-unit.target: PortType 内的操作名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> of the input message element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>的输入的消息元素。</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> of the output message element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>输出消息元素。</xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.target: serviceDescriptionis .

trans-unit.source: -or- portType is .
trans-unit.target: -or- portType is .

trans-unit.source: -or- inputMessageType is .
trans-unit.target: -or- inputMessageType is .

trans-unit.target: -or- outputMessageType is .

trans-unit.source: operationName is or Empty.
trans-unit.target: operationName是或为空。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that will be used when resolving tokens and keys in the WS-Trust message body.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>解决令牌和密钥在 Ws-trust 消息正文时，将使用的。

trans-unit.source: The security token resolver that will be used when resolving tokens and keys in the WS-Trust message body.
trans-unit.target: 安全令牌解析程序将解决令牌和密钥在 Ws-trust 消息正文时使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that resolves the following security tokens contained in the security header of the current WCF message request: protection token, endorsing, or signed endorsing supporting tokens.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref>可解析包含在当前的 WCF 消息请求的安全标头中的以下安全令牌︰ 保护令牌、 认可或签名认可支持令牌。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver> is used to resolve any SecurityTokenIdentifiers when deserializing RST UseKey elements or RST RenewTarget elements.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver>用于反序列化 RST UseKey 元素或 RST RenewTarget 元素时，解析任何 SecurityTokenIdentifiers。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver>

trans-unit.source: The context associated with the request.
trans-unit.target: 与请求关联的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The security token resolver that is used to resolve any SecurityTokenIdentifiers when deserializing RST UseKey elements or RST RenewTarget elements.
trans-unit.target: 安全令牌解析程序用于反序列化 RST UseKey 元素或 RST RenewTarget 元素时，解析任何 SecurityTokenIdentifiers。

trans-unit.source: requestContext is .
trans-unit.target: requestContextis .

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.RequestFailed"></xref> event and converts the specified exception to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException> if required.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.RequestFailed"></xref>事件，并将转换到指定的异常<xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>如果所需。</xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>

trans-unit.source: If the original exception was a <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException> or if the PreserveOriginalException flag is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the conversion to a <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException> is not performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始异常是<xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>或如果 PreserveOriginalException 标志设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，转换为<xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>则不会执行。</xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException> </xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException>

trans-unit.source: The original exception.
trans-unit.target: 原始的异常。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the current WS-Trust version.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 Ws-trust 版本的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The WS-Trust action that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致异常的 Ws-trust 操作。

trans-unit.source: The SOAP version of the request envelope.
trans-unit.target: 请求信封的 SOAP 版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the original exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果引发原始异常。

trans-unit.source: Imports all of the required schemas if not already present in the WSDL.
trans-unit.target: 导入所有必需的架构如果尚不存在的 WSDL 中。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation imports the following schemas: WS-Trust Feb 2005 and WS-Trust 1.3.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现导入以下架构︰ Ws-trust Feb 2005 和 WS 信任 1.3。

trans-unit.source: You can override this method in derived classes to import other schemas.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法在派生类导入其他架构中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> that exports the contract information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"> </xref>导出协定信息。

trans-unit.target: 当前 Ws-trust 命名空间为其导入架构。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a failure happens processing a WS-Trust request from the client.
trans-unit.target: 当发生故障，处理来自客户端的 Ws-trust 请求时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.HandleException%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.HandleException%2A>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.HandleException%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service configuration.
trans-unit.target: 获取服务配置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"></xref> that represents the configuration for the service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration"> </xref>表示服务的配置。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, confirms that the contract and endpoint can support the contract behavior.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，确认协定和终结点可以支持协定行为。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation just returns without throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现只返回而不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This indicates that the specified contract and endpoint are valid.
trans-unit.target: 这指示指定的协定和终结点均有效。

trans-unit.source: Inherited from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: 从<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>继承

trans-unit.source: The contract to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的协定。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要验证的终结点。

trans-unit.source: Validates the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.DispatchContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 验证指定<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.DispatchContext"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method ensures that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.DispatchContext> Object represents a legal request prior to being passed into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.DispatchRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确保<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.DispatchContext>对象表示在正传入到之前的合法请求<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.DispatchRequest%2A>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract.DispatchRequest%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.DispatchContext>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation rejects incoming RST messages with RSTR actions and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现将拒绝传入的 RST 消息 RSTR 操作，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.DispatchContext"></xref> object to validate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.DispatchContext"> </xref>要验证对象。
